text: Psalm 96
Yahweh the King Comes in Judgment
Sing to\f + \fr 96:1 \ft Or “concerning” \f* Yahweh a new song;
sing to\f + \fr 96:1 \ft Or “concerning” \f* Yahweh, all the earth.
Sing to\f + \fr 96:2 \ft Or “concerning” \f* Yahweh; bless his name.
Announce\f + \fr 96:2 \ft Or “bring good news concerning” \f* his salvation from day to day.
Tell his glory among the nations,
his marvelous works among all the peoples.
For Yahweh \add is\add* great and very worthy of praise;
he \add is to be\add* feared above all gods.
For all the gods of the peoples \add are\add* idols,\f + \fr 96:5 \ft This word for idols suggests something worthless or insignificant \f*
but Yahweh made \add the\add* heavens.
Splendor and majesty \add are\add* before him;
strength and beauty \add are\add* in his sanctuary.
Ascribe to Yahweh, you families of \add the\add* peoples,
ascribe to Yahweh glory and strength.
Ascribe to Yahweh the glory due his name;
bring an offering and come into his courts.
Worship Yahweh in holy array;
tremble before him, all the earth.
Say among the nations, “Yahweh is king!
Yes, \add the\add* world is established \add so that\add* it will not be moved.
He will judge \add the\add* peoples fairly.”
Let the heavens be glad and the earth rejoice.
Let the sea with\f + \fr 96:11 \ft Hebrew “and” \f* its fullness roar.
Let \add the\add* field with\f + \fr 96:12 \ft Hebrew “and” \f* all that \add is\add* in it exult.
Then all \add the\add* trees of \add the\add* forests will sing for joy
before Yahweh, for he is coming;
for he is coming to judge the earth.
He will judge \add the\add* world with righteousness,
and \add the\add* peoples with his faithfulness.
